choices: Shrink Pinkie Pie and use her as a lovey
1.content: One day, Pumpkin Cake was playing outside Sugar Cube Corner, when she saw something strange and new: a golden figurine of a 4-winged alicorn with a rainbow-colored gem between its wings. Curious, little Pumpkin went up to the figurine and began teething on it. Suddenly, Pumpkin was engulfed by a rainbow-colored light, and when the light faded, she was a 4-winged alicorn! Somehow, Pumpkin's little mind knew that she was now the most powerful being in Equestria. She decided to use this power to.....
1.title: Mysterious Talisman

11.content: Pumpkin lit her horn, and began sprouting up to.....
11.title: Become gigantic

111.content: Pumpkin Cake was now sixty feet tall, thankfully, she had stepped out of Suger Cube Corner befrorehand, and her diaper had grown with her. "Pumpkin...." A voice called out. Looking down, she saw that the voice came from....
111.title: 60 feet tall

choices: Yes, but make us both bigger
1113.content: "Pumpkin, how did you get so big?" Pound yelled up to his huge sister. "I used my new powers; would you like to be big to?" Pumpkin responded.
1113.title: Pound Cake

11131.content: Pumpkin Cake's horn glowed, as a beam shot out to her brother. Immediatly, the young colt grew to sixty feet, give or take. The two sibilings high hoofed. After knocking over some random buildings, they decided their next target was....
11131.title: Yes

11133.content: Pumpkin grew herself and Pound to 200 feet tall. The massive foals then decided to.....
11133.title: Yes, but make us both bigger

111333.content: Pumpkin and Pound flew to Canterlot. When they got there they.....
111333.title: Go to Canterlot

1113331.content: They started to play with the towns ponies as if they were toys, while they were playing....
1113331.title: Played with the townsponies

11133312.content: Pumpkin felt a twinge in her bladder, sighing, she smiled as she used her padding. Giggling, she high hoofed her brother. Looking around, they decided to play with....
11133312.title: Pumpkin used her diaper

111333122.content: The two headed to the School. The ground trembled as they stomped towards it. Ponies ran in fear of the two. They lifted the roof off of the school building. They looked inside and....
111333122.title: Celestia's School for Gifted Unicorns

1113331221.content: The giant foals grabbed everypony in the school and set them on the ground outside. Then they....
1113331221.title: Grabbed everypony

11133312211.content: Pumpkin and Pound stomped the empty magic school flat. Next they turned their attention to the tiny students and teachers and began playing with them like dolls. When they got tired of their "dolls", they decided to....
11133312211.title: Crushed the empty school

111333122111.content: Pumpkin grew herself and her brother to 500 feet tall. Next, the enormous foals decided to....
111333122111.title: Grow bigger

choices: She grew until she can destroy the Canterlot in a step
1113331221113.content: Pumpkin Cake still wants to be bigger, so she used her power to...
1113331221113.title: She grew herself taller

choices: Play with the townsponies like dolls
112.content: Pumpkin grew until she was 200 feet tall. The townsponies looked up in awe and fear at this giant baby filly that had suddenly appeared in their town. Pumpkin was overjoyed looking down at these ponies she had once looked up at and known as grown-ups. She decided to....
112.title: 200 feet tall

choices: Make her brother, Pound, a giant
Find an Ursa Major to use as a teddy bear
113.content: Pumpkin grew herself to 800 feet tall, giggling happily at her new size. She then decided to.....
113.title: 800 feet tall

1131.content: Pumpkin giggled, turning to the town of Ponyville, who had towered over her mere moments ago. She giggled, and....
1131.title: Play with the tiny town

11312.content: Pumpkin grinned, the various homes around her looking like building blocks stacked together in her young eyes. She decided to leave her home alone. The enlarged Alicorn foal then made sure the houses were evacuated before she began her fun. She hopped over to a building, her hoofsteps causing mini earthquakes. She tapped a building with her hoof, causing it to tip over, and her to giggle. Suddenly, a voice called her name. Turning around, she saw...
11312.title: Knocked around buildings

choices: Made Pound her size so they could use their parents as toys
Picked up her family and placed them on her head
113121.content: "Pumpkin Cake, please stop that right now!" Yelled Mrs. Cake. However, Pumpkin did not stop, instead she.....
113121.title: Her parents and her brother

1131212.content: Pumpkin shook her head, and picked the trio up in her hoof. She wanted them to be safe from her fun. Gently, she set her family on top of her head, and used her mane to keep them from flying off. Satisfied, she began to knock over several other buildings. The oversized foal then.....
1131212.title: Picked up her family and placed them on her head

11312121.content: Pumpkin, as she walked about, felt a gurgiling in her stomach. Squatting down, the oversized Alicorn foal's tail hiked up. She grunted, as a warm, large mass filled her diaper. She giggled as it tented out. Pumpkin then asked for a change from...
11312121.title: Needed a change

114.content: Pumpkin Cake grew herself to 5 miles tall, towering over Ponyville and dwarfing even the mountain Canterlot sat on in the distance! Pumpkin then decided to.....
114.title: 5 miles tall

1142.content: Pumpkin flew into space and far from the planet on which Equestria sat faster than the speed of light. The massive alicorn foal was thrilled seeing the cosmos fly by. Eventually, she came upon....
1142.title: Fly into space

choices: Capture some of the spaceships and put them in her diaper
11423.content: There were 35 spaceships in the fleet, and each one was 1000 feet long. When Pumpkin saw the spaceships, she decided to....
11423.title: A fleet of spaceships

12.content: Pumpkin giggled, as she altered reality so that....
12.title: Alter reallity for fun

121.content: Pumpkin had always felt like it was unfair that only foals could wear diapers, depriving everyone else of its pleasure. Concentrating with all of her might, a powerful magic wave enveloped all of Equestria, putting all of its inhabitants into diapers. When the magic faded, Pumpkin was proud of herself and went outside to see her handiwork. Who does she run into first?
121.title: Everypony wears diapers

1211.content: "Hello sweetie, what are you doing out here?" Cup Cake smiled, her diaper crinkiling as she picked up her daughter. In the reality Pumpkin had created, diapers were the norm. Toilets existed, of course, but very few used them. Her father nuzzled the young foal. Then, suddenly....
1211.title: Her diapered parents

12113.content: As her parents nuzzled her, Pumpkin began filling up her diaper with...
12113.title: Pumpkin used her diaper

121131.content: Pumpkin's diaper sagged heavily with her urine, most likely from all the milk she had at breakfast this morning. Her parents noticed and changed her. As soon as Pumpkin was clean...
121131.title: Pee

1211311.content: Cup Cake squatted slightly, closed her eyes, and began to....
1211311.title: Cupcake uses her diaper

1213.content: Who else does Pumpkin run into?
1213.title: Somepony else

choices: They run into Diamond Tiara and Silverspoon
12132.content:
"Hi, Pumpkin!" Applebloom said as soon as she ran into her. Pumpkin snickered to herself when she noticed the filly-sized diaper on Applebloom's behind. She did so as well when she noticed similar diapers on Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo.

"It's a really beautiful day, huh?" Sweetie Belle said as she picked up Pumpkin and laid her on her back.

"Your parents said we could watch you today!" Scootaloo said cheerfully.

Just then...
12132.title: The diapered Cutie Mark Crusaders

122.content: Ever since Mrs. Cake had started to potty train Pumpkin, the little foal had disliked it from the start. Concentrating, her diaper reappeared around her waist, and her training potty disappeared. It was early, so nopony was awake yet. She then made it so Mr. And Mrs. Cake would never potty train her or her brother, Pound. She then felt a pressure in her....
122.title: She was never potty trained

1223.content: Pumpkin felt a heavy pressure in her rear and bladder. Relaxing her muscles, she felt her diaper begin to expand as she filled it with waste from both ends. The Alicorn filly sat back down, giggiling as her diaper squished beneath her. Her brother coughed, "Wow Pumpkin, you really went to town on that diapee." he giggled, as did his sister. She then toddled over, looking for somepony to change her. She finally ran into....
1223.title: Rear and bladder

choices: Adults and children in Ponyville are physically regressed back into foalhood.
All adults and children are mentally regressed back into foalhood.
All adults and children act like foals.
123.content:
The filly had an idea. With these newfound powers she could achieve so much in so little time, however she thought of something more personal than the idea of an endless path of toys, food and delights. Her few years in this world brought her to the thought of her own life and found it so care-free and happy. The world was much simpler and easier to understand and all the necessity's of life are just found by small food jars, milk bottles, diapers, nap time and play time.

However, the adult ponies didn't see it that way, why didn't they? All they ever did was worry, stress and complicate things more and more so they couldn't see the fun in anything anymore, it shouldn't be like that. If they were more like foals then they would...

And that's when it hit her, a smile and a path of righteousness passed over her and now she was on a mission. All the grown ups should be foals, or atleast act like foals so they'd be able to see the fun and care-free galore that only Pumpkin, her brother and those her age could see.

Her horn began to glow and slowly the magic began to build, and build. A multi-coloured wave of energy soon spiked through the room and went outwards into Equestria with the new ideas, and more importantly, the new world.
123.title: Playing Field

choices: Carrot Cake began to wake up instead.
1233.content:
It didn't take long for the effects of the magic to die down and cool down Pumpkin's small horn but she smiled and looked around to find nothing out of the ordinary. All of the buildings in Ponyville didn't seem to change and neither did the Sugarcube Corner. Puzzled by this, Pumpkin soon trotted back into her home and entered into the main room.

It seemed there was no customers, strange. Pumpkin never kept track of time but she always knew that during the day there was always customers coming in and out of the building to purchase the sweet cakes and delicious candy. She went behind the desk and proceeded to head into the kitchen.

The strangest part of this new world was that the ponies seemed to be missing from their usual place. A lot of the adults had jobs to do and places to go, Pumpkin went down the corridor and soon headed to a place that she knew that her parents would be. The bedroom.

Upon entering her parents bedroom, Pumpkin now noticed the aftermath of her magical spell. Nothing inside the room had changed, but the two ponies inside caught her eyes, now understanding the effects of her new spell.

Cup Cake and Carrot Cake rested on the top of a regular queen-sized bed hooves together locked into a big hug. Pumpkin crawled closer to further inspect her parents. She noticed that both of them both had very large pacifiers in their mouths, one pacifier having a light blue shield for Cup Cake and an orange coloured shield for Carrot.

Pumpkin couldn't help but smile at the sight, her parents were using the same type of pacifier as her, this felt, so funny. To see a grown up using a pacifier. With both adults resting in bed, Cup Cake soon stirred and rubbed her hoof across her face.
1233.title: All adults and children act like foals.

choices: Pumpkin decides to find another pony to play with.
Cup Cake begins to wake up.
12333.content:
Carrot Cake began to stir more than usual. From Pumpkin's point of view she knew the behaviour, after all, she did this herself. Her father's eyes slowly opened up and the stallion soon leaned up and stretched his hooves, still unaware of the pacifier inside his mouth being constantly suckled. Pumpkin started to mimic her father and began to suckle on her hoof.

The pacifier that Carrot suckled on soon dropped out of his mouth and fell onto the bed. He looked down and saw his happy little daughter sitting at the other side of the bed, peacefully sucking on her hoof.

"Ooh, Pumpkin." Carrot yawned. "What's baby doing up so early? It's eleven in the morning." Drool began to escape from his mouth and it slowly made its way down to the chin. He began to place his hoof into his mouth and began to suckle on it. He lay back down and kicked his legs a little, with that, the blanket soon was kicked away from Carrot enough for Pumpkin to see he was wearing a thick white diaper nicely taped around him. The front of the diaper had colourful designs with teddy bears, bottle, rattles and building blocks on the front.

Carrot soon stopped his kicking and began to lean forward again, he gave Pumpkin a dopey smile. Pumpkin looked at the diaper and realized that he was wetting it. The front began to turn from white to yellow in an instant.

"Hnn-g." Carrot grunted through his now wet hoof. "I did a pee-pee." His smile began to grow, before being followed with another yawn. "Need more sleepy-time." He picked up the pacifier he dropped early and pushed the nipple back into his mouth and began to suckle on that. He wiped his wet hoof on the blanket, leaving a small stain of drool.

Pumpkin's smile and excitement quickly dropped. Her father was going back to sleep, this wasn't part of the plan.
12333.title: Carrot Cake began to wake up instead.

choices: Pinkie Pie and Pound Cake are in the kitchen.
Cup Cake and Pumpkin enter the empty kitchen.
123332.content:
Cup Cake began to stir again and Pumpkin quickly smiled again. This could be her chance!

Her mother slowly opened her eyes and leaned up much like her husband. The pacifier still kept in her mouth and what appeared to be a thick diaper with the same designs wrapped around her flank, same as Carrot's. Pumpkin slowly trotted forward and caught the attention of her mother, she put her hoof in her again and suckled on it.

"Baby." Cup Cake smiled. The smile looked different compared to her fathers, the smile seemed a lot more care-free and happy, normally Cup Cake doesn't smile in the morning. And in seeing this change, made Pumpkin all the more happy, too.

"Sweet baby." Cup Cake's pacifier dropped out of her mouth and onto the bed, causing a small amount of drool to follow suit. She pointed at Pumpkin's dry diaper. "Baby no go potty." Her mother pointed out in a childish tone of voice. Cup Cake kicked the blanket off of her and revealed more of the diaper she was wearing, which too, was wet.

"I go pee-pee in my diaper." Cup Cake pointed at her own padding. "See?" She smiled.

Pumpkin couldn't help but smile at the sight of both her parents. They had begun to do what she herself did nearly all the time, use their diapers speak like a true foal and use small words because they were much cuter and took less time to say.

Cup Cake slowly climbed out of bed and gave a stretch and a big yawn, she turned and looked out of the bedroom window and looked back at Pumpkin.

"Baby." She slowly trotted up to her daughter. "Num-nums?" She asked.

That was a word that Pumpkin could understand perfectly. After all this time changing the fabric of reality and quite possibly the whole of Equestria she decides another bite to eat wouldn't hurt. The foal quickly raised her hooves up in the air, asking to be carried to the kitchen. Cup Cake smiled and gave her daughter a little kiss before slowly waddling to the kitchen in her very wet diaper.
123332.title: Cup Cake begins to wake up.

1233321.content:
Pumpkin felt happy now that things were moving along, she got the chance to ride on her mothers back, something that hasn't been done in a long time. She scoured the idea of being told to trot like a big pony, now this was just perfect as it should be

It took a little longer than usual to reach the kitchen due to Cup Cake's slow waddling. Pumpkin didn't mind, her parents were in diapers and they seemed to be happy, they'll change themselves later down the road.

As they both entered the kitchen, both ponies noticed that the fridge door was wide open.

Pinkie Pie and Pound Cake both sat in front of the fridge with an assortment of bottles with different drinks, jars of food and juice boxes. None of them appeared to be used, just stacked outside the fridge ready for breakfast. Cup Cake frowned at the two ponies and slowly trotted over to the two, still unaware of the visitors.

Cup Cake stopped behind the two ponies and cleared her throat. Both stopped what they were doing and slowly turned round to see Cup Cake behind them, Pound's smile dropped and Pinkie Pie mischievously smiled.

"Baby can explain!" Pinkie Pie nervously giggled. The pink party pony soon stood up, despite her used diaper spreading her legs outward due to the thickness. Cup Cake continued to frown.

Pumpkin leaned over the side and looked at her baby brother, Pound had a small splash of milk on his face where he had been drinking out of his bottle. She smiled at the sight of her brother back in diapers and drinking from bottles again. It was before the magic she learned of the betrayal to foal-kind where he abandoned his diapers and bottles for a sippy cup and the big potty upstairs. That'll teach him a lesson for growing up.

Pinkie Pie pointed a hoof at Pound and looked back to Cup Cake, who was still waiting for an answer.

"Bad baby, bad baby did it!" Pinkie Pie childishly cried out. Pound Cake didn't seem to care about that, he reached for another bottle and planted the rubber nipple into his mouth and began to suckle.

"Nuh-uh." Cup Cake objected to Pinkie's claim. "Greedy baby." She pointed a hoof at Pinkie, which caused the party mare to back herself up against the fridge. "Naughty baby, get no num-nums."

Cup Cake's word is law in the Sugarcube Corner, second only to Pumpkin. Pinkie Pie slouched over the jars she had taken out of the fridge and began to let out a few tears, sniffles ensued and Pinkie began to lightly cry.

Pound finished a bottle and let out a small burp and the kitchen fell into silence. Pinkie Pie, who not only was just crying a few moments ago was now beginning to laugh. Cup Cake followed and then finally Pumpkin let out a giggle.
1233321.title: Pinkie Pie and Pound Cake are in the kitchen.

choices: Pumpkin decides to leave the kitchen and explore.
Pumpkin decides to wait it out instead.
12333212.content:
With their little session over, the four ponies continued with their daily activities.

Breakfast was almost at hand for Pumpkin, Pound and Pinkie Pie as the three were all securely placed into their of highchairs, with Pound and Pumpkin both sharing theirs together. Pumpkin couldn't help but be astonished at the sheer size of the adult sized highchair that Pinkie Pie was in. All three ponies had bibs on with a little catch for any food that falls down. Pinkie wasn't like her usual self in the highchair, the party pony seemed to be rather calm after the whole ordeal with the fridge, she's always a greedy baby.

Cup Cake turned to face the two babies and the overgrown foal sitting in the highchair next to them. Her back was the resting place for a food tray that had three large bottles and three jars of baby food, one being a little larger than the other two. Pinkie Pie noticed the food and began to squirm around in her chair, her tail swished from side to side and a grin swept across her face.

"Ooh! Ooh!" Pinkie Pie reached out for the big far of baby food. "Me! Me!"

Cup Cake ignored Pinkie's pleas for food and trotted over to her children, she smiled at both of them and placed both jars onto the plastic tray. "Num-nums for babies." She turned to Pinkie Pie and hushed her. Pinkie's smile dropped and continued to watch the two foals be given their breakfast.

Pumpkin watched as Cup Cake turned the food jars upside-down and allowed their contents to fall all over the plastic tray. Pumpkin was confused by this at first, normally her mother would bring a small bowl and a spoon over and hoof-feed them herself. But there wasn't a bowl, or even a spoon, Pumpkin was confused for a moment until she noticed her brother picking up the apple mush and started eating it with his hooves, more fell into his bib than his own mouth but it looked fun. Cup Cake didn't do anything to stop the babies at all, she looked at them and smiled.

Pumpkin copied her brother and happily gorged on the food in front of her, she knew to take it slow or else it would fall down into her bib. She stopped for a second to watch her mother walk over to the breakfast table, sit down and then proceed to suck her hoof for a good minute or two. Pinkie Pie also sucked on her hoof and proceeded to wet her diaper.

As both babies were filling up their stomachs with delicious mush, they didn't know that their father had entered the kitchen. Carrot Cake walked into the kitchen with a brand new diaper on and walked in and sat at the table. He stared at his wife who was still sucking on her hoof, he smiled and looked at Pinkie Pie, who was also doing the same thing.

"Hello, baby." Carrot smiled at Pinkie.

"Hello." Pinkie smiled back. She her hoof out of her mouth and leaned against the plastic tray attached to the highchair.

Carrot didn't even have to reply to this. He knew what Pinkie Pie wanted and she was going to get it. He trotted over to the table and picked up the large jar of baby food and twisted the lid open, he then went back over to the high chair and placed the food on the tray for Pinkie.

Pinkie Pie grabbed the jar without even thinking and began to suckle on the top like a bottle. Carrot look on with a smile before heading over to the babies and patting each of them on the head. He tapped Pound on the head and rubbed his mane with a smile, only to get food on his hoof.

He reached over to Pumpkin to see she had finished her food first, he undone the straps around her and let her down from the highchair, placing her on the kitchen floor and pushing a pacifier in her mouth.

"Good baby." Carrot chuckled.

Pumpkin saw no point in waiting around for her brother or even Pinkie Pie to finish, despite how fast she guzzled down her food which will leave her with an upset tummy.
12333212.title: Carrot Cake enters the kitchen.

choices: Pumpkin reaches the Ponyville School and see's it as a daycare.
Pumpkin decides to head out to the library instead, wanting to find more spells.
123332121.content:
With her family all busy having breakfast, Pumpkin decided it was best to explore this new world of hers and find out what has really happened to not only Ponyville, but the rest of Equestria. The foal soon left the kitchen with her pacifier still in her mouth, she suckled on it slowly and headed straight for the front door, which was still left open when she found the amulet.

Her sights on the new Ponyville were nothing but spectacular. All of her planning, ideas and wishes for a happier life for the grown ups has paid off. Pumpkin took her first few steps outside the Sugarcube Corner's front gates and noticed a few ponies, specifically grown ups wandering the streets with the odd colt or filly following the grown up.

Just like her parents the magic had spread to the rest of the town's inhabitants and gave them a much stress-free and happier lifestyle thanks to the magical blast she had summoned earlier. Grown ups of all different kinds wore thick babyish diapers with the same designs her parents wore with the children also wearing the same, just a little smaller for their size.

Some had pacifiers in their mouths which some suckled or let dangle around their necks, some wore onesies, bonnets, sleepers and others carried toys, bottles, packs of diapers and some of the younger ponies were being pushed in large strollers while very few walked alongside what seemed to be their parents. Pumpkin stood in awe at the handy work that her magical powers allowed her to perform, this was perfection in every way. Ponies seemed to be smiling everywhere, grown ups smiled, talked and sat in the middle of the road to hug and play together with whatever toys they had.

Pumpkin knew that if she was going to find the right amount of ponies to have fun with, she'd have to find a group of foals like her. She knew the layout of the town, thanks to her mother taking her on trips around to almost every building when it came to delivering cakes. A place with lots of foals and toys would be the Ponyville school.

The foal began to head towards the Ponyville school in order to see how the children had begun to adapt to their new lifestyle. One that she thought they needed the most after the grown ups made them abandon their diapers and care-free life.
123332121.title: The New World

choices: Pumpkin realizes that she's found the Cutie Mark Crusaders.
Pumpkin decides to find another group of foals to play with.
1233321211.content:
It didn't take long to cross the streets of Ponyville and make her way to the school at the edge of town. Her excitement to see the faces of the older children was going to be the most interesting and most satisfying.

The outside of the school didn't really look that different from the last time she saw it. The outside of the school didn't really look that different, it looked the same as it always did and there was nothing that Pumpkin could pick up on that made it feel different in any way.

Pumpkin reached the school doors and opened them slightly to enter the classroom.

Upon entering the classroom, she noticed that the interior of the school had been changed considerably. All of the boring desks, whiteboards, posters and other educational equipment found in a normal classroom had been removed in favor of crudely drawn images made by the children who are in the school. Large plastic containers filled to the brim with toys, building blocks and toy carriages.

The former students, now foals were all scattered around the room, all wearing diapers and different assortments of baby clothing made for their sizes. Fillies and colts all played together in groups, some played with the toys, chased each other or went into a changing line which was found at the back of the room.

Pumpkin eyed up a trio of fillies all sitting in a corner, each playing with a pair of toys. The three fillies were all wearing thick white diapers which had the same babyish images on the front just like the other ponies she had seen. One of them had a pacifier in their mouth and sat on a pillow, rocking back and forth with a smile on her face.
1233321211.title: Pumpkin reaches the Ponyville School

choices: Cheerilee comes over and notices Applebloom's dirty diaper.
Sweetie Belle wakes up from her nap and decides to play.
12333212111.content:
Upon closer inspection, Pumpkin realized she had located the Cutie Mark Crusaders. The three fillies who were always trying to find their cutie marks in order to grow up, a shame, Pumpkin shook her head. They shouldn't be trying to grow up, they should be playing out in the fields with their toys instead of trying to find those pesky cutie marks.

Applebloom and Scootaloo seemed to be sitting beside eachother both playing with a selection of toys that were scattered out the classroom. A small pile of select toys were chosen by the two and brought back to this very corner they all played in. Save for Sweetie Belle, she lay on top of a large pillow resting her head with a pearl white pacifier in her mouth which she contently suckled on. Pumpkin noticed her eyes seemed to be a bit heavy, the white filly must be having her own nap-time despite the other fillies and colts still playing their games.

Pumpkin got up close to the other two fillies and noticed they had some toy blocks, which both Scootaloo and Applebloom all piled up together to make a tower. Until Pumpkin decided to boop the tower with her hoof and knock it down, causing some of the blocks to fall on top of Scootaloo. The pegasus filly shook her head and looked at the little foal, looking surprised to see her.

"Pumpkin!" Scootaloo stood up, her diaper crinkling all the way and toddled over to the foal and wrapped a hoof around her, bringing them into a hug. Pumpkin smiled at the two fillies and dropped her pacifier right next to her.

"Wanna play?" Applebloom asked. Pumpkin couldn't resist a game of blocks, she looked at the blocks and saw Scootaloo placing one block on top of the other. But it was too slow for her, Pumpkin giggled, she charged up a wave of magic in her horn and a light green aura of magic swallowed the blocks and levitated them into the air.

The blocks flew above the fillies heads as they both gasped in excitement. Applebloom was so excited that she leaned back and fell on her back, giggling all the way. The blocks soon quickly placed on top of each other in just a few seconds and Pumpkin seemed satisfied.

Scootaloo stuck a hoof in her mouth and looked at the tower of blocks, she then looked at Pumpkin and silently nodded. The foal moved forward and happily pushed the blocks over from the bottom, they all soon fell down on top of Applebloom who was still lying down on the carpet.

Both Pumpkin and Scootaloo soon erupted into a burst of laughter as Applebloom lay still with the several blocks still lying on top of her. However, the apple filly was lying down for a different reason. She pushed one of the blocks away from her and picked up Pumpkin's pacifier and placed it in her mouth and started to suckle on it.

"Tee-hee." Scootaloo giggled. She looked at Pumpkin and then looked at Applebloom. "Stinky filly."

Applebloom began to make grunting noises under the pacifier and her legs began to idly kick. At the seat of her diaper, a mass began to form which pushed out from the bottom, Pumpkin realized that she was messing herself.

It didn't take long for Applebloom to finish what she was doing, she stopped and sat upwards to look at the other two ponies who just watched what she did.

"Uh-oh." Applebloom blushed. "I did a stinky." She drooled.

Scootaloo giggled. "Stinky filly."

"Stinky filly." Applebloom nodded in agreement.

The fillies didn't really seem to make anything of the stinky diaper, they just continued back to their games and most importantly: the blocks. Pumpkin also continued to play, using her magic to create another tower using the pushed down blocks. The repetition never sank in for the fillies, the blocks falling down and landing in a different position every time seemed to be the most amazing thing since sliced bread for Applebloom and Scootaloo.
12333212111.title: The Crusaders

choices: Applebloom comes back after being changed into a new diaper.
Scootaloo has a plan, she wants to escape school and play outside.
123332121111.content:
Pumpkin had moved on to other things by the time the eighth tower had been knocked down by Scootaloo and the now stinky Applebloom. She really liked playing with these fillies, they all had great personality and were extremely playful.

Pumpkin took back the pacifier that Applebloom took, by waiting for the filly to drop it out of her mouth by being unable to concentrate on more than one thing at once. She climbed to the top of the pillow that Sweetie Belle slept on and sat next to the unicorn filly with the pacifier in her mouth. The food she had back at the Sugarcube Corner was now taking its toll and she began to feel tired from all the walking she had done from her home to the school.

The foal leaned up against Sweetie Belle's stomach and rested her head up against her. Pumpkin got a much better view of what was going on in the classroom now that she was in a higher position, even if it was just a pillow. One of the grown-ups that Pumpkin recognized was trotting over to her group. Miss Cheerilee slowly made her way over to Applebloom and Scootaloo who was also wearing a diaper with a pacifier in her mouth. She dodged the playful students and made sure not to trample their tails or even the toys.

Cheerilee had a purple pacifier in her mouth with a bright yellow shield around the edges, her diaper was that of the rest of the ponies she encountered. A thick white disposable with babyish images on the front. The teacher wore a pair of glasses, which made her look much more older than she actually was.

Applebloom and Scootaloo stopped what they were doing and looked at Cheerilee, who was sniffing the air and recoiling in disgust.

"Well?" Cheerilee prodded Scootaloo's diaper, feeling nothing out of the usual. "Who did the stinky?"

"Nuh-uh." Scootaloo shook her head. "I'm dry."

"Applebloom?" Cheerilee prodded the apple fillies diaper and felt some kind of mush down in the back. She smiled. "A-ha!"

Applebloom's ears went down. "I didn't do stinky!"

"Yuh-uh." Cheerilee nodded. "Time for a changie."

"Aww..." Applebloom groaned. She kicked one of the toy blocks in frustration.

Pumpkin had seen this type of thing before, in fact, she's experienced having to go for a countless amount of diaper changes. As time passed she learned that diaper changes were necessary and were sometimes good breaks, even to avoid an awful rash. But to her surprise, Cheerilee picked up Applebloom by the scruff and lifted her into the air. Pumpkin's mouth dropped wide open.

Applebloom was lifted into the air, diaper sagging down to the ground, Cheerilee grabbed the filly by the neck and carried her over to the changing table on the other side of the room. Pumpkin rubbed her eyes, she couldn't be seeing this.

There were a few times where Cup Cake had done something like that to Pound, but not to a big filly like Applebloom.

This new world was strange, yet beautiful at the same time.
123332121111.title: Cheerilee comes over

choices: Cheerilee catches Scootaloo attempting to escape.
1233321211112.content:
With Applebloom gone from the picture, Scootaloo didn't have anyone else to play with. Pumpkin kept herself on the pillow next to Sweetie Belle who still slept through everything despite how noisy it was in the school. The orange pegasus filly soon turned and looked at Pumpkin and grinned, she placed a hoof on her chin and began to rub it, whilst sliding it into her mouth and sucking on it a few times before taking it out.

Pumpkin jumped off the pillow and stared at the filly, something was on her mind, like she had an idea. And whatever it was, Pumpkin wanted in.

"Pumpkin." Scootaloo whispered to the foal. "We play." She smiled.

Pumpkin nodded.

"Nuh-uh." Scootaloo shook her head, she pointed at the school entrance. "Out there, baby can play outside."

Pumpkin looked at the entrance, she knew the door was unlocked and the plan seemed a bit simple, but then again. The world was NOW a lot simpler than before, so she allowed it.

Scootaloo got up from the carpet and stood next to the pillow, gesturing for Pumpkin to ride on her back. Pumpkin soon crawled over to Scootaloo's back and placed her hooves on the fillies wings. Scootaloo slowly waddled over to the front doors and pushed them open, occasionally looking back in case Cheerilee would spot them.

Both ponies slipped out of the building and into the empty playground, Pumpkin initially thought that they would play in the playground a few minutes earlier than everyone else. But that wasn't the case, Scootaloo decided to head to the school gates.

She was stopped when she tried to slip through the metal bars, Scootaloo tried to stick her head through again but it didn't work, she wouldn't fit. Pumpkin on the other jumped down and slipped through the bars without a problem.

There was something in Scootaloo's now infantile mind that registered something was wrong, or atleast, she was doing something wrong according to her. Pumpkin seemed to slip through the bars without a problem, she however, couldn't. She forced her head through the bars one more time before realizing that she isn't going anywhere, this was starting to upset her.
1233321211112.title: Escaping School

choices: The duo head to the centre of town.
The duo head out to find one of the Mane 6.
12333212111121.content:
Pumpkin looked back at the school and found her new filly friend sitting on the gravel with the thick diaper acting a pillow against the hard surface that was the playground floor. Scootaloo began to let out several whines along with a few tears which ran down her face, she stuck a hoof through the gate and reached out for Pumpkin to help her.

Not good. Not good at all, Scootaloo was starting to cry. And any moment soon, Cheerilee would burst out of the school door and whisk her away back into the classroom. Pumpkin liked Scootaloo, and she didn't want to see the overgrown foal upset.

Thinking back to her early days, she once used a trick on Pinkie Pie when she was placed inside her crib. She didn't want to sleep, she wanted to play with her brother. Her horn did a magic trick and allowed her to walk through the wooden bars unscathed and to escape her imprisonment.

Concentrating on her horn and the gate, the obstruction soon became transparent before Scootaloo's very eyes. The filly stopped crying and proceeded to slowly walk through the gate, unsure of what just happened. Once she walked through, Pumpkin stopped her magic and made the gate solid once again.

Scootaloo wiped several tears from her face and sniffled.

"Thank you." Scootaloo started to smile, still wiping the tears from her face.

Pumpkin smiled at the filly.

Without mentioning, Pumpkin climbed back onto Scootaloo's back and placed her hooves onto her wings and held tight.
12333212111121.title: Scootaloo begins to cry.

123332121111212.content:
For once, Pumpkin was content. The plans had come together and now she'd seen what her magic can really do for all the ponies in Equestria. But she craved something different, she was happy playing with the toys and seeing her family wearing diapers and being care-free but now she wanted to see the lives of all the other ponies and see how happy they really are.

Scootaloo began to trot down the streets of Ponyville, passing by so many adults and children, all playing in their diapers and having fun like there was no care in the world. Pumpkin had noticed that some buildings, specifically the restaurants had replaced all of the chairs and tables with high chairs. Pumpkin noticed a unicorn pony sitting in one of the restaurants in a large high chair being served a bottle of milk and a small bowl of what appeared to be baby mush. The pony reached into the bowl without thinking of how dirty he would get and shoved the food into his mouth, giggling at the sight of how dirty was getting. A pony shortly came to clean him up with wipes and soon cleaned up the high chair.

Pumpkin had noticed that Scootaloo stopped right in her tracks. The orange filly looked up in the sky and noticed a cloud floating over one of the restaurants. Scootaloo pointed a hoof at the cloud and then looked at Pumpkin, looking rather concerned.

"Dashie." Scootaloo called up to the cloud.

There was no response from the cloud whatsoever and so Pumpkin leaned to Scootaloo's side and decided to look up at the cloud with the filly.

"Dashie." Scootaloo called again.

Pumpkin knew that the filly was calling for Rainbow Dash, the mare who kept on flying around the sky at breakneck speeds. But it didn't take a genius to realize that Rainbow Dash wasn't sitting on the cloud, she'd probably be inside her home sleeping in a crib like how Pumpkin had envisioned.
123332121111212.title: Locating an Element

choices: It was Spike, being changed by Twilight.
Twilight was being changed by Spike, who is also wearing a diaper.
1233321211112122.content:
It wasn't long before Scootaloo forgot about calling for Rainbow Dash and continued to walk through the streets of Ponyville.

Pumpkin didn't know where Scootaloo was going and she didn't want to know. The entire trip around town felt like an adventure in itself, seeing all the different parts of Ponyville now changed because of her magical powers was always a treat. And to see the a group of adults sitting together in a park via a large circle playing a game of chase and duck duck goose despite their thick diapers making them waddle as they ran made her giggle at the sight.

They soon reached the quieter parts of town, mostly the suburbs and the little apartments where all of the inhabitants of Ponyville lived. In the middle of this part of town was the library, a place where one of Pinkie's friends lived with a baby dragon. Pumpkin thought it would be interesting to see if her magic had affected the baby dragon to make sure he was happy, the ponies were one thing, but a baby dragon being told to stop being a baby and act like a grown up? That was insane, she had to see this.

The foal tapped the back of Scootaloo's head and caught her attention, Pumpkin gestured for the filly to head in the direction of the library. Scootaloo nodded and headed for the front door.

Scootaloo went up to the front door and used her head to open it, but it wouldn't budge, she reach upwards or else risk Pumpkin falling backwards onto the pavement.

Pumpkin charged up her horn and gripped onto the door handle, the handle slowly turned and the door clicked open, allowing Scootaloo to push it open with delicate pushes. They both entered the library and got a whiff of a fresh scent, Pumpkin sniffed the air and knew that smell from anywhere.

It was changing powder, both ponies wondered who was being changed as they headed deeper into the library until entering Twilight's bedroom.
1233321211112122.title: Scootaloo & Pumpkin encounter Twilight & Spike.

choices: Twilight began to change Pumpkin's diaper.
Twilight levitated Pumpkin into the crib.
12333212111121221.content:
The smell of the changing powder was at its strongest when Scootaloo and Pumpkin entered the bedroom for the first time. Pumpkin first noticed that Twilight's room seemed a little bit more like foals room than one who is a grown up, several rows of books seemed to be missing and replaced with foal supplies and posters that screamed education and reading were replaced with crude drawings of several ponies that even she couldn't make out.

In the middle of the room were scattered toys, several empty bottles and food jars which were stacked on top of a food tray and several foal themed dresses made for the size of a grown up.

Pumpkin had begun to see even more changes to the world as she knew it when she noticed a giant crib sitting in the place of what would usually be a bed made for a grown up. Twilight Sparkle and Spike were sitting inside the crib, surrounding by stuffed toys and toys with a mobile hanging from the ceiling.

Spike was lying down in the crib on top of a plain white changing mat, his legs wildly kicked in all directions as Twilight put the finishing touches on his diaper. Using her magic, she taped up the drake and tapped his bottom with her hoof to sign that he was finished. The dragon crawled off the changing mat and picked up a dark green pacifier that was lying beside his pillow and stuffed it into his mouth.

Twilight levitated the changing mat and placed it outside of the crib, upon looking where it was going to land, she noticed Scootaloo and Pumpkin standing in the middle of the room. Scootaloo seemed to be interested in one of the toys that was on the ground whilst Pumpkin looked at Twilight and Spike with a smile.

"Scootaloo? Pumpkin?" Twilight smiled. "How nice to see you both." She climbed out of the crib and waddled over to the duo, wearing a thick purple diaper with the image of the royal crest on the front instead of the usual babyish imagery that Pumpkin noticed on all the other ponies. "I didn't know you two were in the library. Do any of you need a changie before I put the mat away?"

Pumpkin tilted her head at first, confused for why Twilight was speaking like her old self barring some changes in vocabulary. It had been evident that all the other grown ups and children spoke using small words as babyishly as possible. It wasn't a problem for Pumpkin at all, just confusing and somewhat jarring at first.

Twilight looked at Scootaloo and rubbed the filly's mane with her hoof and follow her action up with a smile. "Do you need a changie?"

"Err..." Scootaloo didn't know whether to answer or not. Her diaper didn't feel wet, nor did she feel any weight at the back in case she had messed herself. "Dunno."

Twilight craned her head down and noticed the fillies diaper was now wet, to the point of almost leaking. "It's a good thing you got here when you did or else you'd have an even bigger accident. We wouldn't want all of your pee-pee leaking out now, wouldn't we?"

Scootaloo blushed at this information and slowly trotted over to the changing mat. Pumpkin jumped off the fillies back and watched her drop down onto the changing mat, squishing her near-leaking diaper as she sat on the water-proof layer of the mat.

"My goodness." Twilight giggled at the filly. "Somepony has done a big potty in their diaper, haven't they?" She trotted over to Scootaloo and used her magic to undo the tapes on her diaper, soon the diaper was balled up and Scootaloo's nether regions were cleaned up. The filly raised her backside into the air as a diaper flew underneath her and taped itself around her.

"All done." Twilight sang. "Why aren't you in the daycare, little one?" Twilight lowered her head and nuzzled the filly. "Did you escape?" She cooed, speaking over Scootaloo's giggles. "Such a smart little foal."

Pumpkin also smiled at this. If it wasn't for her then Scootaloo wouldn't have made it out to begin with, but it was part of the fun and games.

"Big filly! Big filly!" Scootaloo cheered, before shoving her hoof into her mouth. She was soon levitated into the air and placed into the crib, alongside Spike who was getting comfy by sitting on top of his pillow.

Twilight turned to see Pumpkin sitting on her own, still smiling well after the change had finished. "Come here, Pumpkin." She gestured for the foal to come over.
12333212111121221.title: It was Spike, being changed by Twilight.

123332121111212211.content:
Pumpkin walked toward Twilight and was soon encased in a levitation field.

"Looks like somepony else needs a changie as well." Twilight teased as she levitated the mat underneath Pumpkin and laid her on top of it. Pumpkin looked down, and sure enough, she had wet herself without even noticing. She smiled, realizing that she was having so much fun with this new world that she didn't even know she needed a change.

Twilight undid the tapes of the diaper and wiped Pumpkin's nether regions as she repeated the process as she did with Scootaloo. As Pumpkin was being changed, she looked over at Spike and Scootaloo in the crib. Scootaloo was hugging a stuffed rabbit while Spike dazed off, suckling on his pacifier. Pumpkin was glad her magic also affected non-ponies. A baby dragon not being allowed to be a baby? That was just silly.

"There you go Pumpkin, a clean diaper for you to go potty in." Twilight chirped, nuzzling the foal. She turned around to levitate her pacifier into her mouth, and Pumpkin noticed her diaper was wet and messy. Pumpkin giggled. Looks like she wasn't the only one who needed her diaper changed.

As Twilight began to suckle her pacifier, Scootaloo was getting a bit reckless, aggressively chewing on the rabbit's ear as Spike joined in. She looked up to see Pumpkin in a fresh diaper and spat out the rabbit. "Play!" She yelled excitedly.

"What would you like to play, filly?" Twilight smiled through her pacifier.

"Want to see Dashie!" Scootaloo beamed.

"Hmm... Dashie should just be finishing her nap." Twilight mused as she sat down, squishing her messy diaper as she did so. "What do you think, Pumpkin?" She titled her head at the foal.

Remembering her word was final, Pumpkin decided to go to...
123332121111212211.title: Twilight began to change Pumpkin's diaper.

choices: Twilight re-enters the room with a special guest.
Pumpkin begins to play with the two foals.
123332121111212212.content:
Pumpkin only took a few steps closer to the lavender mare before finding herself caught in a levitation field, the unicorn soon lifted the foal up into the giant crib and placed her on a soft pillow.

Scootaloo and Spike were both on the opposite end of the crib, grabbing the nearest toy and playing with it together. Pumpkin didn't realize that her magic also extended to other creatures besides the regular ponies, it seemed that Spike was also affected by the magic and too wore a diaper, suckled on a pacifier and from the looks of it, had a ton of drool escape the pacifier's sides and hang on the edge of his chin.

Twilight soon closed the crib's door and looked at the three foals, Pumpkin being the only one to even acknowledge her as the other two were playing.

"You stay right there." Twilight giggled. Her horn began to glow and a nearby pacifier began to float over to her mouth, she grabbed the nipple and began to suckle on it. She soon waddled over to the door and left the room, unaware that her diaper was both wet and messy.

Pumpkin climbed over the sheets and the pillows to continue watching Scootaloo and Spike play with an oversized plush bunny, Scootaloo leaned forward and wrapped her hooves around the plush and embraced it into a big hug. Spike on the other hand spat out his pacifier and laid his teeth into the back at the bunny and teethed on the bunny's tail.
123332121111212212.title: Twilight levitated Pumpkin into the crib.

choices: Mrs. Cake. She had come to pick up Pumpkin.
Princess Celestia. She had come to see the foals.
1233321211112122121.content:
It felt like an eternity.

Pumpkin Cake couldn't help but realise that something strange was going on, not the fact that a pegasus filly and a baby dragon were both sitting opposite her and playing with a bunch of toys when they weren't supposed to. But the fact that it's been a good ten minutes and Twilight still hasn't returned, Pumpkin was going to be very kind and not use her magical powers to open up crib doors to let her and her new friends out to explore the rest of the bedroom.

Maybe Twilight had gone into another room and changed her own diaper? After all, it was full. But could a grown up, now turned adult foal take so long? It seemed likely but strange for such a smart pony, even if she now acquired the intellect of a three year old.

Pumpkin didn't pay attention to the other foals in the crib but found her peaceful thoughts were soon snapped by a loud bang. It seemed that Spike had crawled over to the foal and slammed his toy pirate ship into a nearby pillow, causing several pieces to break apart and end up under the blankets. Pumpkin giggled at the toy's destruction and moved closer to the wooden bars.

The door to the bedroom soon slowly opened, causing a smile to appear on Pumpkin's face, Twilight Sparkle soon entered the room with a brand new diaper and the same pacifier she stuck in her mouth. This time, she wore a bib around her neck and a little piece of velvet which was attached to the bib encase the pacifier were to fall.

"Hello." Twilight spat out of her pacifier and waved at the three foals in the crib, Scootaloo and Spike soon turned to see the former librarian enter the room with a big smile.

All of the foals, besides Pumpkin stopped what they were doing and soon toddled over to the crib bars. Spike even stuck his claws through the bars and tried to reach for his caretaker.

"Look who came to visit!" Twilight trotted further into the room and pointed a hoof back at the door, the door opened a little more to reveal...
1233321211112122121.title: Twilight re-enters the room with a special guest.

15.content:
Here are some more scenarios:

Scenario 2: Pumpkin is exposed to a plant from the Everfree forest and gains powers.

Scenario 3: Pumpkin always had incredible powers and only now reveals them.

Scenario 4: Pumpkin is somehow transformed into a draconequus foal (this is Discord's species in case you don't know) but she is more powerful than most adult draconequi.
15.title: Different scenario

choices: Pumpkin gets a potion plus sizing
154.content:
How bout

Scenario 4 -
Pumpkin gets exposed to someponies
potion causing her to continually have
growth spurts! Just how massive will
Pumpkin become?



Scenario 5 -
Pumpkin comes across a magic lake or
spring who’s waters increase the
drinkers size the more they drink every drink
154.title: More scenarios

info.brief_description: Baby Pumpkin Cake from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic becomes incredibly powerful!
info.description:
This story is about baby Pumpkin Cake from the cartoon My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic gaining god-like power. MLP:FIM is the property of Hasbro and I make no profit off of this story.

Rules for posting:
-This is partially a macro story, so Pumpkin must become gigantic at some point. Make her as big as you wish as long as it's bigger than a house.
-Pumpkin can have any powers you wish as long as her powers are far beyond that of any of the characters from the show, including the princesses and Discord.
-No blood, gore, sex, or swearing.
-Pumpkin is mostly gentle, but she likes to chew on her toys, and, like most toddlers, she is playful and hard to control.
-It is encouraged for Pumpkin to give her brother Pound or other baby ponies powers, though they can not be as powerful as her.
-If you don't have a passing knowledge of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, you may want to refrain from adding to this story.
